newsitem.title: USA: Economist criticizes Fed rate rise, more increases.
newsitem.headline: Economist criticizes Fed rate rise, more increases.

text.p: A senior private economist criticized the Federal Reserve on Tuesday for raising interest rates and voiced hopes it will only tighten credit one more time.
"My guess and my hope is that we will see one more increase by the Fed," Lawrence Chimerine told the National Association of Purchasing Management.
If the central bank only raises rates once more it won't be enough to hurt the economy much, Chimerine added.
He also told the group that the dollar has become overvalued and is being manipulated by foreign governments for their own economic good.
